fields.Notes: Taoyuan City SEAMI (Southeast Asian Migrant Inspired) www.facebook.com/SoutheastAsianMigrantInspired/
italki call to action: Get a free Thai lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_tha
Demographics: 20,200,000 in Thailand (2000). 400,000 Khorat. 4,700,000 mother-tongue Thai are ethnic Chinese, or 80% of the Chinese (1984). Population total all countries: 20,396,930. L2 users: 40,000,000 in Thailand (2001 A. Diller).
